item.description:
Join Dan Agro of AgroMyco and Resilient Roots for a fun and educational mushroom walk. Dan will bring you through; ideal growing environments, times of year to find mushrooms, safe and thorough identification, and how to preserve and prepare medicinal and edible species . This walk will be in the Raymond area and location will be announced the week of the workshop. Please wear proper clothing for walking in the woods and bring small knife and a bag.


Rt 302, turn right onto Route 85, 7 miles to trailhead (on the left)for Rattlesnake Mountain.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Mushroom Foraging Walk
